<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/polymer/polymer.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/iron-icons/iron-icons.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/iron-icon/iron-icon.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/paper-button/paper-button.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/paper-radio-button/paper-radio-button.html">
<link rel="import" href="../../bower_components/paper-radio-group/paper-radio-group.html">
 
<dom-module id="question-preview">
  <style media="screen">
    #wrapper {
      width: 100%;
      background: #fff;
      overflow: auto;
      padding: 5px;
    }
    #play {
      position: absolute;
      display: none;
      left: 50%;
      top: 50%;
      height: 50px;
      width: 50px;
      margin-left: -25px;
      margin-top: -25px;
      color: #fff;
    }
    .info {
      position: relative;
      width: 96%;
      padding: 0 2% 1%;
    }
    paper-radio-group {
      display: block;
    }
    paper-radio-button {
      display: block;
      width: 100%;
    }
  </style>
  <template>
    <div id="wrapper"
      on-mouseover="onHover"
      on-mouseout="onHout">
      <div class="info">
        <h4>{{question.name}}</h4>
        <span>{{question.description}}</span>
      </div>
      <paper-radio-group selected="0">
        <template is="dom-repeat" items="{{question.answers}}" as="answer">
          <paper-radio-button name="{{answer}}">{{answer}}</paper-radio-button>
        </template>
      </paper-radio-group>
      <paper-button on-tap="submitAnswer">
        Enviar Resposta
      </paper-button>
    </div>
  </template>
  <script>
    Polymer({
//======================== Polymer Component Methods =========================//
      is: 'question-preview',
      properties: {
        // property that holds the model element: a Subvideo
        question: {
          type: Object,
          value: null,
          observer: "questionChanged"
        },
        selection: {
          type: String,
        }
      },
      attached: function() {
      },
      onHover: function() {
      },
      onHout: function() {
      },
      questionChanged: function() {
        if(this.question){
          this.id = "_"+this.question._id;
        }
      },
      submitAnswer: function() {
        this.fire('answer-submited');
      }
    });
  </script>
</dom-module>
